titleStmt.title: Valentine Jones v. Nathaniel Seavers & George Hagley. Summons Nathaniel Seavers & George Hagley

bibl.title: Summons Nathaniel Seavers & George Hagley
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the original.

org.orgName: United States. Circuit Court (District of Columbia)

div2.p:
District of Columbia, to wit:
The United States of America,
To the Marshal of the District of Columbia, Greeting:

You are hereby commanded to summon Nathaniel Seavers & George Hagley if they shall be found in the County of Washington, that they be and appear in the Circuit Court of the District of Columbia, at rules to be held for the County of Washington, at the City of Washington, on the first fourth Monday of March next, to answer the bill of complaint of petition of freedom of Valentine Jones filed in Court here against and others. them
Hereof fail not at your peril; and have you then and there this precept.
Witness the Hon. W. Cranch, Chief Judge of the said Court.

p.del: Memorandum: The defendant to enter appearance in the suit, on or before the ady on which the above subpoena is returnable, otherwise the bill may be taken pro confesso.

div2.p:
Valentine Jones
vs
Nathaniel Seavers & Geo. Hagley

Sumd Nathaniel Seavers Non Est Hagley & dead
A Hunter
Marshal
